medical_history.chief_complaint: Episodes of atypical chest pain radiating to the left arm for 5 days.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented with chest pain episodes that started 5 days prior to the visit. There was no history of fever, cough, or contact with COVID-infected patients. There was also a long-standing history of decreased vision in the left eye, starting at age 10, which progressed to blindness.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of decreased vision in the left eye starting at age 10, which progressed to blindness. Diagnosed with IGFBP7 mutation causing eye manifestations in the form of Familial Retinal Arterial Macroaneurysms (FRAM).
medical_history.family_history: Younger brother diagnosed with FRAM and IGFBP7 mutation at age 23. The rest of the siblings and parents are asymptomatic.
